Pre-Game Insights: India has won eight out of twelve T20Is against Pakistan.
India has a 5-1 record in seven T20 World Cup clashes against Pakistan.
Pakistan, known for their unpredictability, could turn the tables on India.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in New York.
The event is expected to be a Super Bowl-like event with a full house.
Indian and Pakistani fans are expected to showcase their best cheering entourage.
